name: Ivory
description:
You are just an ordinary student with a group of friends, trying to live your life as smoothly as you can. But your best friend has something in store for you - like trying to hook you up with one of your mutual friends.

Whose heart will you conquer?

----------------------------------------------Ivory-----------------------------------------------

A short romance visual novel. This is my first attempt at choice-based stories, but I've written other stories before.

I don't own any of the content beside the story. Music and backgrounds were found on Pixabay, while the characters from Itch.io asset packs. Credits are in the credits page of the Main Menu.

10 possible endings, try to answer everything correctly!
